page.name: MHS Unicef Club
page.description: Unicef Club serves to educate and advocate to students for children in third-world countries like Nigeria that don't have access to basic living necessities. We have 4 teams, education, sanitation, health, and protection that work together in their divisions to organize monthly events for club members and students. We partner with other clubs to organize donation drives, for items like sanitation products or even toys for underprivileged kids.
